(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Kobe) (NN beef))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NNS foods))
            (PP (IN on)
              (NP
                (NP (PRP$ my) (NN list))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNS things)
                    (S
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB eat)
                          (SBAR (IN before)
                            (S
                              (NP (PRP I))
                              (VP (VBP leave)
                                (NP (DT this) (JJ mortal) (NN sphere))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

dobj(leave-17, sphere-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN ban))
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN export))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNP Kobe) (NNP Beef))
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP
                      (NP (JJ many) (NNS years))
                      (PP (JJ such) (IN that)
                        (NP (DT the) (JJ only) (NN way)
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB experience)
                                (SBAR
                                  (S
                                    (NP (PRP it))
                                    (VP (VBZ is)
                                      (S
                                        (VP (TO to)
                                          (VP
                                            (ADVP (RB actually))
                                            (VB travel)

    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP (JJ many) (JJ foreign) (NNS ships))

          (VP (VB ask)

                (NP (NN delivery))

              (NP (NNP Kobe)))))))

                      (NP (PRP you))
                      (VP (VBP have)
                        (VP (VBN eaten)
                          (S
                            (ADJP (JJ real)))))))))))))
      (PRN
        (S
          (NP (NNP Kobe) (NNP Beef))
          (VP (VBZ means)
            (NP (NN nothing))
            (PP (TO to)
              (NP (PRP you)))))
        (, ,)))))


mark(able-3, if-1)
cop(able-3, being-2)
root(ROOT-0, able-3)
aux(boast-5, to-4)
xcomp(able-3, boast-5)
mark(eaten-9, that-6)
nsubj(eaten-9, you-7)
aux(eaten-9, have-8)
ccomp(boast-5, eaten-9)
acomp(eaten-9, real-10)
nn(Beef-12, Kobe-11)
nsubj(means-13, Beef-12)
dep(able-3, means-13)
dobj(means-13, nothing-14)
prep(means-13, to-15)
pobj(to-15, you-16)

    (NP (RB then))
    (VP (VBD let)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP me))
          (VP (VBP say)
            (SBAR (IN that) (IN if)
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))
                (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
                  (VP (VB eat)
                    (NP (DT the) (NNP US) (NNP Kobe)
                      (CC and)
                      (JJ real) (NNS Kobe) (NN side))
                    (PP (IN by)
                      (NP (NN side)))))))))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN told)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Chef) (NNP Josh))
            (PP (IN about)
              (NP (PRP it)))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP he))
      (VP (VBZ assures)
        (NP (PRP me))
        (SBAR (IN that) (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP he))
            (VP (MD will)
              (VP (VB start)
                (S
                  (VP (VBG working)
                    (PP (IN on)
                      (NP (PRP it)))))))))))
    (. !)))

        (NP (NN hand))))
